Fault.name: PublishARInvoiceOracleToOSG_BPEL.bpel
Fault.fix: Make sure that the return value of from-spec query is compatible with the to-spec query
Fault.msg: <from> value type "{http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema}int" is not compatible with <to> value type "{http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema}string"

Fault.name: PublishARInvoiceOracleToOSG_BPEL.bpel
Fault.fix: Make sure that the return value of from-spec query is compatible with the to-spec query

Fault.name: PublishARInvoiceOracleToOSG_BPEL.bpel
Fault.fix: Use one of the built-in boolean functions from xpath http://www.w3.org/TR/xpath#section-Boolean-Functions to convert the return value to boolean
Fault.msg: xpath expression "bpws:getVariableData('firstLoop')" used in <case> may not return boolean type value, the xpath engine would automatically try to convert the return value to boolean
